channel.title: Oh mah goshhh Ima kill this toaster of a computer!
channel.description: Okay, so I'm trying to jar a client to develop a webclient. Only problem is after creating it and signing it I get the same error. [code]Error: Could not find or load main class c:\Users\******\Desktop\client.jar[/code] Please help me fix this. If it helps I have tried multiple clients and also tried creating the jar with cmd prompt. [b]HELP![/b] :(

item.title: Oh mah goshhh Ima kill this toaster of a computer!
item.dc:creator: @jake.bellotti jake.bellotti
item.description:
@jake.bellotti wrote:

Looks like you are telling it to get your client.class file from the .jar file. You link it to the place where your class files are.

Read full topic
